What is a stake pool

Midgard is a Cardano stake pool. The Cardano network uses stake pools to facilitate transactions and mint new blocks. They can be either public or private.

Users can deligate their ADA to any public pools and, in return, receive rewards for their participation. Every year the rewards received are on average 5-6%. Staking your ADA with a public staking pool is 100% safe. Your ADA never leaves your wallet and is never locked, thus earning you 5-6% a year in passive income.

Stake pools are run by a reliable operator, either an individual or a business, with the knowledge and resources to run the node consistently—usually experts in their fields.

Telegram | Twitter | Pooltool.io | Adapools.org
